quote: We will act consistently with our view of who we truly are, whether that view is accurate or not. – Tony Robbins
fact: Count the number of cricket chirps in a 15-second period, add 37 to the total, and your result will be very close to the actual outdoor Fahrenheit temperature.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What's the difference between a hippo and a zippo? One is really heavy, the other is a little lighter.
